name: FalconFeeds.io
description: Official MCP server for FalconFeeds.io threat intelligence data
long_description: Connect real-time cybersecurity threat intelligence to MCP clients through standardized tools and resources. Access comprehensive IOCs, CVEs, TTPs, and threat actor data from [FalconFeeds.io](https://falconfeeds.io) with seamless integration across Claude Desktop, VS Code, and other MCP-enabled applications

tools.name: Get_threat_feeds
tools.description: Get a list of threat feeds. You can optionally filter by threat feed UUID, category, or victim information.

tools.name: Get_IOCs
tools.description: Get all IOCs (Indicators of Compromise) using a flexible set of optional filters.

tools.name: Get_IOC_threat_actors
tools.description: Get a list of threat actors. You can optionally filter by threat actor UUID, name, or country

tools.name: Get_IOC_malwares
tools.description: Get a list of malwares. You can optionally filter by malware name, malware UUID, or threat actor UUID.

tools.name: get_threat_actor_profile
tools.description: Get a comprehensive threat actor profile including attributed threat feeds.

tools.name: search_threat_actors
tools.description: Search threat actors with optional filters.

tools.name: get_threat_actor_by_id
tools.description: Get a specific threat actor by UUID.

tools.name: search_threat_actors_by_name
tools.description: Search threat actors by name prefix.

tools.name: get_next_threat_actor_page
tools.description: Get the next page of threat actor results.

tools.name: get_cves_by_date_range
tools.description: Get CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) within a specified date range.

tools.name: get_next_cve_page
tools.description: Get the next page of CVE results.

tools.name: search_cves_by_keyword
tools.description: Get CVEs by searching with a keyword.

tools.name: get_cve_by_id
tools.description: Get a specific CVE by its identifier.

FALCONFEEDS_API_KEY.title: FalconFeeds.io API Key
FALCONFEEDS_API_KEY.description: Your FalconFeeds.io API key for accessing threat intelligence data.
